title: Eureka Bagless Canister Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight Vac for Carpets and Hard Floors, Silver with Black, NEN180
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.

EUREKA NEN180 bagless canister vacuum cleaner has effective cleaning performance. With a powerful 960w motor and 16kpa suction power that can capture large particles instantly, it quickly separates dust and air to prevent recontamination, ensuring sustained and powerful suction. With just one machine, you can clean without worrying.

Switch seamlessly between floor and carpet cleaning modes with our versatile vacuum cleaner. Featuring a foot-activated switch that allows you to switch modes without bending over, ensuring a convenient and comfortable cleaning experience.

EUREKA NEN180 has three-stage filtration that effectively captures and filters dust particles. With an impressive filtration efficiency of up to 99.9%, this fully sealed canister vacuum cleaner can trap dust particles as small as 0.3 micrometers, ensuring clean air and safeguarding the health of your loved ones.

NEN180 bagless canister vacuum cleaner comes with large 2-liter dust cup, providing ample capacity for extended cleaning sessions. The filter and dust cup of this vacuum cleaner for home can be washed directly with water, making daily maintenance more convenient and provides no extra consumables and no additional costs.
With the adjustable knob, you can freely controls the suction power and controls the noise at the same time for your preference, providing customizable cleaning performance.
If you have any questions,contact our customer service team at 1-800-282-2886
